subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Session, last night. [2 Attachments]
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Well, I'll be out on a hill in the middle of nowhere on the 15th trying to
make microwave radio contacts with other radio amateurs. 10 miles from the
nearest town, 45 miles form home. If anything weird happens I might never
know it!

Zack
